scripts.clean: sudo npm run clean:platforms && rm -rf www && npm run prepare
scripts.clean:platforms: cordova platform rm browser && cordova platform rm android && cordova platform rm ios
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:folders && npm run build:www && sudo cordova prepare
scripts.prepare:folders: mkdir -p www/js && mkdir -p www/vendors && mkdir -p www/css && mkdir -p work/dist && npm run prepare:splashscreens && npm run prepare:icons && npm run prepare:copy
scripts.prepare:copy: cp work/index.html www && cp -r work/assets www && npm run copy:vendors
scripts.prepare:splashscreens: mkdir -p res/screen/ios && mkdir -p res/screen/android && cp work/assets/img/splashscreen.png res/screen/android && cp work/assets/img/splashscreen.png res/screen/ios && mv res/screen/ios/splashscreen.png res/screen/ios/Default@2x~universal~anyany.png
scripts.prepare:apps: npm run build:www && sudo cordova prepare
scripts.copy:vendors: cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/underscore/underscore.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/backbone/backbone.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/requirejs-plugins/src/async.js www/vendors
scripts.build:www: npm run prepare:copy && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:map
